source.title: Microsoft Outlook is getting an AI overhaul under new leaders - The Verge
source.name: The Verge

facts: Microsoft is getting ready to overhaul Outlook again.
The mail app is being rebuilt with a focus on AI.
This initiative comes under new leadership at Microsoft.

neutral.headline: Microsoft Prepares for Another Overhaul of Outlook Focused on Artificial Intelligence
neutral.body_html: Under the guidance of its latest leaders, Microsoft is set to revamp their popular email application, Outlook. The rebuild will prioritize artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. This initiative represents another significant upgrade for Microsoft's flagship product.

conservative.headline: Microsoft Announces AI-Driven Overhaul of Outlook
conservative.body_html: Under the leadership at Microsoft, a new direction for their email application, Outlook, is being planned. The focus will be on integrating AI technologies into its core functionalities.

liberal.headline: Revolutionary Microsoft Outlook Overhaul Emphasizes Accessibility and Inclusivity Through Advanced AI
liberal.body_html: In a progressive move, Microsoft's latest leaders are spearheading an overhaul of the widely-used email application, Outlook. This revamp will not only integrate cutting-edge artificial intelligence but also prioritize accessibility and inclusivity features to ensure that all users can benefit from these advancements.
